Docs.summary: The namespace contains classes that you can use to override the life-cycle stages of a Web control. The classes enable you to modify a control's markup or behavior for new markup standards or for specific browsers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter> class is inherited by <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.MenuAdapter> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.DataBoundControlAdapter> classes.
